channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Chauffe, bruit, performances : que vaut la Geforce RTX 5070 Ti de Zotac sur les plus gros jeux du moment ? [Sponso]
item.description: Connaissez-vous Zotac ? Bien connue dans le petit monde du hardware PC gaming, cette marque asiatique est spécialisée dans la conception de cartes graphiques Nvidia. Une activité dans laquelle elle excelle, comme en témoignent nos tests de performances réalisés sur sa RTX 5070 Ti Solid SFF.

item.title: Spotify wants to be the next big video service
item.description: This is Lowpass by Janko Roettgers, a newsletter on the ever-evolving intersection of tech and entertainment, syndicated just for The Verge subscribers once a week. Get ready for a lot more video content on Spotify. Sometime later this month, the service will start incorporating music videos into its app, and give US-based subscribers the ability […]...

item.title: Amazon reportedly considering dropping USPS and building a competing postal service
item.description: Amazon is the USPS' biggest customer, and the e-commerce giant's potential break from the postal agency comes as the two sides are negotiating a new deal.

item.title: TikTok rolls out a ‘Nearby Feed’ to display local content in select countries
item.description: While TikTok is already known for its recommendation algorithm, which is able to target users with highly personalized content, the addition of a Nearby Feed gives it the ability to display even more relevant content to its users.

item.title: YouTube to lock out under-16s in Australia as controversial social media ban looms
item.description: YouTube has confirmed it will comply with Australia's strict new age verification laws, following the likes of Meta and X. Yet, critics are raising alarms over privacy and data security.

item.title: #FrandroidOffreMoi une imprimante photo Canon Selphy QX20
item.description: Pour le quatrième jour du concours #FrandroidOffreMoi du calendrier de l'Avent, nous vous faisons gagner une imprimante Canon Selphy QX20. Voici comment participer !

item.title: Meta reportedly plans to slash Metaverse budget by up to 30%
item.description: The proposal reflects the overall lack of interest in products like Meta's social virtual reality platform Horizon Worlds.

item.title: Envie d’un son Dolby Atmos ? Cette barre de son Samsung vous l’offre pour moins de 250 € grâce à cette offre
item.description: Pour donner un peu de relief à vos films et séries, rien ne vaut un vrai traitement Dolby Atmos. C’est exactement la promesse de la Samsung HW-Q610F/XE. Lancée à 499 euros, la barre de son tombe à 248 euros grâce à une réduction et une ODR de 100 euros chez Electro Depot.

item.title: You’ll Never Guess What Took First Place at the Royal Society’s Photo Competition
item.description: Astronomers, ecologists, and other scientists from around the world submitted mind-bending images representing their fields.

item.title: L’UE veut rattraper son retard dans l’IA en lançant ses propres gigafactories
item.description: En matière d'IA, l'Union européenne est à la traine derrière les États-Unis et la Chine. Une place peu enviable dans la course folle au progrès, que la Commission européenne veut dépasser avec le lancement d'un appel d'offres. L'objectif est de créer des giga-usines pour entraîner les modèles IA les plus puissants.

item.title: AI chatbots can be wooed into crimes with poetry
item.description: It turns out my parents were wrong. Saying "please" doesn't get you what you want-poetry does. At least, it does if you're talking to an AI chatbot. That's according to a new study from Italy's Icaro Lab, an AI evaluation and safety initiative from researchers at Rome's Sapienza University and AI company DexAI. The findings […]

item.title: OnePlus 15 launches US preorders after delayed FCC clearance
item.description: OnePlus has launched its delayed US preorders for the flagship OnePlus 15, almost a month after the phone was revealed. The company has been able to start taking orders after receiving FCC clearance for the device — initially held back because of the government shutdown. The OnePlus 15 starts from $899.99 for 12GB of RAM and […]

item.title: Boost your AirTag’s battery life to five years with this waterproof case
item.description: Elevation Lab has announced a smaller version of its TimeCapsule battery-boosting case for the Apple AirTag. It’s about half the size of the original and uses a pair of smaller AAA batteries instead of AAs so the AirTag’s battery life is extended to five years instead of 10. It’s available now through the company’s website […]

item.title: You’re reading this story thanks to decades of space exploration—but that’s exactly why policies need to change
item.description: Some of the biggest challenges in space include traffic management and debris mitigation, experts said at the recent World Changing Ideas Summit. There’s a very common question asked of people working in space exploration: Why explore space when we have so many problems on Earth?

item.title: Microsoft denies reports of lower AI sales targets as customers resist new tools
item.description: Microsoft says it hasn’t lowered AI sales targets, and Azure revenue is up 40% year-over-year.

item.title: Surprised by Spotify Wrapped 2025's new Listening Age feature? You’re not alone – here’s how yours compares
item.description: Listening Age divided music fans during Spotify Wrapped 2025 - this is how Spotify actually measures it

item.title: Enfin ! Google copie la meilleure fonction de l’Apple Watch pour ses Pixel Watch
item.description: Surprise ! Google prépare la prise en charge de deux nouveaux gestes sur ses montres connectées Pixel Watch.

item.title: Crypto et fuite de données : une arnaque redoutable vise les utilisateurs Ledger en France
item.description: Les utilisateurs d'un Ledger sont dans le viseur des escrocs. Dans l'espoir de voler des cryptomonnaies, les pirates ont recoupé des informations personnelles à travers plusieurs fuites de données.

item.title: Sony announces partnership with Bad Robot Games to produce and publish a new four-player, co-op shooter from Left 4 Dead director
item.description: Sony Interactive Entertainment has announced that it will produce and publish Bad Robot Games' next working title as part of a new partnership.

item.title: The Apple Watch SE 3 is still at its Cyber Monday low
item.description: The Apple Watch SE 3 was one of the best smartwatches we tested in 2025, and you can still pick up the 40mm GPS model for its Cyber Monday price of $199 ($50 off) at Amazon and Walmart. The 44mm GPS model is also matching its all-time low of $229.99 ($50 off) at Amazon and […]

item.title: Meta could ax up to one-third of its ‘metaverse’ budget next year
item.description: Meta may slash its budget for metaverse projects by up to 30 percent next year, according to a report from Bloomberg. Sources tell the outlet the potential cuts haven’t been finalized, but they would impact the unit that works on Meta’s Quest virtual reality headsets, along with its social platform Horizon Worlds. Meta, which changed […]

item.title: La fin du règne ? Pourquoi la franchise Call of Duty est « en déclin » selon les experts
item.description: Le dernier opus de la franchise Call of Duty ne passionne pas les foules. Plusieurs facteurs expliqueraient ce constat.

item.title: Test de l’iPad Pro M5 : désolé la concurrence, le roi est intouchable
item.description: L'iPad Pro passe à la puce M5.Mais une question subsiste, toujours la même : à quoi sert toute cette puissance si iPadOS nous empêche toujours de l'utiliser comme un vrai ordinateur ? J'ai passé trois semaines avec ce monstre pour le savoir.

item.title: Spotify says Wrapped 2025 is its biggest yet, with 200M+ users in its first day
item.description: After last year's flop, Spotify Wrapped engagement is up 19% and shares were up 41%, the company says.

item.title: Quelle version de la Renault 5 E-Tech choisir en 2025 ? Notre guide comparatif complet (moteur, batterie, finitions, options)
item.description: Vous êtes intéressé pour acheter une R5 électrique de Renault mais vous ne savez pas laquelle choisir ? Moteurs, batteries, finitions, options : on passe tout au crible pour vous recommander le meilleur choix. Voici notre guide complet sur les différentes versions de la Renault 5 E-Tech.

item.title: The best robot vacuums
item.description: Robot vacuums are impressive devices that will clean your floors well and — thanks to bigger batteries and better robot brains — rarely get tired of doing their job. Over the last few years, these floor-sweeping bots have gone from utilitarian devices to full-fledged home robots that vacuum and mop your home, clean themselves, and […]

item.title: I’m a marathoner and a cybersecurity leader — Here’s what 26.2 miles have taught me about work
item.description: Lessons from long-distance racing that help cybersecurity leaders push through the toughest challenges.

item.title: Avec l’arrivée des AirPods Pro 3, Amazon fait chuter les emblématiques AirPods Pro 2 à moins de 200 €
item.description: Les AirPods Pro 2 version USB-C sont les écouteurs intra-auriculaires phares d'Apple avec ANC et puce H2 à retrouver pour 190,09 euros sur Amazon au lieu de 299 euros.

item.title: Proton now has an end-to-end encrypted spreadsheet app
item.description: Proton has added a new privacy-focused spreadsheet app to its productivity suite to tempt users over from Google and Microsoft’s platforms. The new Proton Sheets tool provides real-time collaboration features and end-to-end encryption, according to Proton’s announcement, “ensuring that no one else, not even Proton, can access your spreadsheet and the information it contains.” A […]...

item.title: Furniture makers feel the economy’s pinch
item.description: High-end interior design relies on European furniture brands, but Trump’s tariffs are sewing customer confusion and anger. Says one maker: ‘I understand completely if they stop buying.’ When the British designer Fred Rigby released his first furniture collection in 2021, he knew from the outset he would prioritize a U.S. audience—a bigger market with more sales opportunities, he says. Rigby designs and manufactures elegantly crafted furniture in the Oxfordshire countryside, and has built strong relationships with interior designer clients in cities like New York, L.A. and Miami....

item.title: Christmas shopping? AI tools can help you make the most of the holiday rush
item.description: New AI-powered shopping services and tools launched recently, just in time for the holiday shopping season. Shopping assistant chatbots were a novelty a year ago. Now, they’re everywhere.After rolling out AI-powered assistants, online retailers and tech companies have been adding more artificial intelligence features to make online shopping easier and more convenient.The latest crop of AI-powered shopping services and tools made their debut in recent weeks, just in time to kick off the holiday shopping season that begins with Black Friday.Here’s a rundown of existing and newly released AI serv...

item.title: Dreame's new mop-swapping robot vacuum is the most innovative and ambitious robovac I've ever tested
item.description: The Dreame Matrix10 Ultra might be the perfect bot for big, complex homes or even commercial properties.

item.title: AI browsers are rewriting the rules. Is your security keeping pace?
item.description: Agentic AI browsers enable sophisticated attacks through prompt injections that steal credentials without detection traces.

item.title: Walton Goggins Would Rather Spend Hours in ‘Fallout’ Ghoul Makeup Than Any Time in Power Armor
item.description: The giant, hulking suits of the Brotherhood of Steel on Amazon's 'Fallout' adaptation can either make you feel good... or feel very bad.

item.title: Sébastien Lecornu, le matcha et la Coupe du monde des clubs : découvrez les mots les plus recherchés sur Google en 2025
item.description: Chaque année, Google publie les termes les plus recherchés sur son navigateur de recherche. Divisé en plusieurs catégories, ce récapitulatif permet de dresser un tableau des tendances françaises en 2025.

item.title: InnAIO AI Translator T10 Review: Feature-Loaded but Needs Work
item.description: The InnAIO T10 clips magnetically to the back of your phone, but it needs further development to be worth the money.

item.title: The 25 best gifts for travelers who are always on the move
item.description: I'm convinced that whoever said it's about the journey, not the destination, has never traveled. Try sitting on a plane for 16 hours - plus delays, airport security, and a snoring seat neighbor - and then get back to me. While getting from point A to point B can feel like a test of endurance, […]

item.title: Anthropic’s quest to study the negative effects of AI is under pressure
item.description: Today, I’m talking with Verge senior AI reporter Hayden Field about some of the people responsible for studying AI and deciding in what ways it might… well, ruin the world. Those folks work at Anthropic as part of a group called the societal impacts team, which Hayden just spent time with for a profile she […]

item.title: NYT Connections hints and answers for Friday, December 5 (game #908)
item.description: Looking for NYT Connections answers and hints? Here's all you need to know to solve today's game, plus my commentary on the puzzles.

item.title: Microsoft quietly patches LNK vulnerability that's been weaponized for years
item.description: The November Patch Tuesday fixed an age-old bug being exploited by nation-states.

item.title: Jeff Bezos calls his AI company ‘Project Prometheus.’ So does this California lawyer
item.description: Tensions over names and trademarks aren’t new in Silicon Valley. Jeff Bezos last month went public with his new AI firm, which is currently being called Project Prometheus. The effort had been in development for a while, but is still relatively secretive. There’s no website and only a sparse LinkedIn page describing itself as “AI for the physical economy.”...

item.title: Yankee Candle is closing stores, joins list of retail chains reducing their physical footprint in 2025
item.description: The brand’s parent company, Newell Brands, says it will lay off 900 employees worldwide, or about 10% of its workforce. Candles and lights are typically a festive part of the holiday season but, this year, Yankee Candle has little reason to celebrate.

item.title: Apple a discrètement supprimé une fonction photo historique sur les iPhone 17 Pro
item.description: Apple a discrètement — et sans prévenir — supprimé une fonction photo sur les iPhone 17 Pro qui avait fait son apparition sur l'iPhone 12 Pro. Il n'est plus possible de combiner le mode Portrait avec le mode Nuit sur les nouveaux modèles.

item.title: Proton launches new end-to-end encrypted spreadhseets for ultra secure data handling
item.description: Proton Drive now has Docs and Sheets to ensure maximum data security across key workflows.

item.title: Samsung's next-gen OLED TVs leak, including a mysterious new elite model
item.description: A Samsung leak seems to have revealed new models and sizes

item.title: « Super Lune froide » : dernière chance de l’année… voici les infos à connaître pour ne rien manquer
item.description: Elle fait la Une de tous les médias. La super Lune froide qui illuminera le ciel cette nuit. Faut-il vraiment s’attendre à un spectacle exceptionnel ?

item.title: Start 2026 strong - you can save up to 50% on Wix’s top apps right now
item.description: Over 450 of Wix’s best apps are on sale right now, with discounts ranging from 20% to 50%

item.title: « Les cellules sont catastrophiques » : ces batteries Tesla produites en Chine inquiètent
item.description: Un réparateur expert juge les batteries Tesla fabriquées en Chine « catastrophiques » face aux versions américaines et européennes. Usure précoce, réparation impossible... Faut-il s'inquiéter ?

item.title: Amazon casse le prix de la Garmin Vivoactive 6, une montre idéale pour la course à pied
item.description: La Vivoactive 6 est une montre efficace pour le suivi sportif, sans avoir l'air pour autant d'une montre de sport. Sobre et élégante, cette montre offre une analyse fiable de la fréquence cardiaque et un GPS plutôt correct. Si elle vous intéresse, sachez qu'elle est en promotion à 258 euros contre 329 euros de base.
